b5.name: Quarry
b5.description: A quarry, to mine donuts from.

b6.name: Extraction
b6.description: A fleet of spaceships, extracting donuts from various sources.

b9.name: Energy-Donut Transverter
b9.description: Change massive amounts of energy to donuts.

bB.name: Singularity
bB.description: A donut, compressed to a single point.

upgrades.name: Singular Click
upgrades.flavor: One click.

upgrades.name: Dual Click
upgrades.flavor: A small group clicks.

upgrades.name: Triple Click
upgrades.flavor: A few clicks.

upgrades.name: Quad Click
upgrades.flavor: Some clicks.

upgrades.name: Quinta Click
upgrades.flavor: Some more clicks.

upgrades.name: Sixtal Click
upgrades.flavor: A gang of clicks.

upgrades.name: Septimal Click
upgrades.flavor: A lot of clicks.

upgrades.name: Octal Click
upgrades.flavor: A LOT of clicks.

upgrades.name: Novenal Click
upgrades.flavor: Too many clicks.

upgrades.name: Deci Click
upgrades.flavor: Really, 1000000000 clicks? Might want to think about outside storage.

upgrades.name: Plain Donut
upgrades.flavor: A plain donut that always gets eaten last in the variety pack.

upgrades.name: Glazed Donut
upgrades.flavor: A glazed donut. Yum!

upgrades.name: Vanilla Donut
upgrades.flavor: This donut begs for sprinkles.

upgrades.name: Sprinkled Donut
upgrades.flavor: This donut begs for vanilla frosting.

upgrades.name: Vanilla-Sprinkled Donut
upgrades.flavor: This donut still wants more. It's quite greedy.

upgrades.name: Chocolate Donut
upgrades.flavor: Chocolate donut rules all.

upgrades.name: Positive Donut
upgrades.flavor: Stuck in the center.

upgrades.name: Negative Donut
upgrades.flavor: Almost glows with the current of tomorrow.

upgrades.name: Red and Green Donut
upgrades.flavor: Donuts are the new standard near fireplaces.

upgrades.name: Hollow Donut
upgrades.flavor: Been done before.

upgrades.name: American Cheese
upgrades.flavor: Boring old American cheese.

upgrades.name: X-Tra Sharp Cheddar Cheese
upgrades.flavor: Cheddar cheese so sharp, no musician dare comes near it.

upgrades.name: Swiss Cheese
upgrades.flavor: Cheese with holes. For a mouse, a mobile, edible home. Hope they don't run away.

upgrades.name: Blue Cheese
upgrades.flavor: Goes well on top of green eggs and ham.

upgrades.name: Nacho Cheese
upgrades.flavor: I guess it is yo cheese now...

upgrades.name: The Big Cheese
upgrades.flavor: If the mice find out about this, you'll never click again.

upgrades.name: Vegtable Oil
upgrades.flavor: A way to make your donuts have slightly more nutritional value.

upgrades.name: Petroleum Oil
upgrades.flavor: Now you can contribute to global warming too!

upgrades.name: French Fryer
upgrades.flavor: Fryers from France are proven to be twice as efficent as those from anywhere else.

upgrades.name: Fish Fry
upgrades.flavor: Apparently, donuts and fish go well together.

upgrades.name: Deep Fryer
upgrades.flavor: Submerge your donuts under twice as much oil, cooking them in half the time.

upgrades.name: Fire Fryer
upgrades.flavor: Yes, this is a fire hazard.

upgrades.name: Rain Dance
upgrades.flavor: A rain dance, invented by the elders.

upgrades.name: Two Cans
upgrades.flavor: These two cans full of dough should help coat the island.

upgrades.name: City of Donuts
upgrades.flavor: Your adventurers have found the city the Spainish dreamed of.

upgrades.name: Water-Donut Converter
upgrades.flavor: The Amazon could use donuts.

upgrades.name: Deforestation
upgrades.flavor: Clear out land so you can get more donuts.

upgrades.name: Reforestation
upgrades.flavor: Turns out, donut trees exist.

upgrades.name: Canoe
upgrades.flavor: A small boat to fish for more donuts.

upgrades.name: Motorboat
upgrades.flavor: A small, powerful boat to fish for more donuts.

upgrades.name: Steam Ship
upgrades.flavor: A large boat to fish for more donuts.

upgrades.name: Submarine
upgrades.flavor: A large, underwater boat to fish for deep-sea donuts.

upgrades.name: Hydro-fission Ship
upgrades.flavor: A large, extraordinarily powerful boat to fish for more donuts.

upgrades.name: Calamari
upgrades.flavor: Donut of the sea.

upgrades.name: Wooden Tools
upgrades.flavor: Weak tools.

upgrades.name: Cobblestone Tools
upgrades.flavor: Kinda weak tools.

upgrades.name: Iron Tools
upgrades.flavor: So-so tools.

upgrades.name: Diamond Tools
upgrades.flavor: Strong tools.

upgrades.name: Obsidian Tools
upgrades.flavor: Nearly unbreakable tools.

upgrades.name: Bedrock Tools
upgrades.flavor: Unbreakable tools.

upgrades.name: Launch Pad
upgrades.flavor: Blast off!

upgrades.name: Control Cabin
upgrades.flavor: In a rocket ship.

upgrades.name: Entrance Prize
upgrades.flavor: A large spaceship to go where no one has gone before.

upgrades.name: Cheese-Dough Converter
upgrades.flavor: With the moon being made of cheese, we thought we should cash in.

upgrades.name: Warp Drive
upgrades.flavor: Makes ships 100% faster. Also has a tendency to break when you need it most.

upgrades.name: Donut Planet
upgrades.flavor: A planet. Looks like a donut. If it's not one, at least we have moon rocks.

upgrades.name: Lead
upgrades.flavor: Boring metal.

upgrades.name: Copper
upgrades.flavor: Shiny and rather expensive.

upgrades.name: Silver
upgrades.flavor: More shiny and more expensive.

upgrades.name: Gold
upgrades.flavor: Weak, shiny and EXPENSIVE.

upgrades.name: Platinum
upgrades.flavor: SHINYYYYYY!

upgrades.name: Philosopher's Stone
upgrades.flavor: Makes donuts. Has a side effect of eternal life.

upgrades.name: Black Hole
upgrades.flavor: A hole. Note that it is black.

upgrades.name: White Hole
upgrades.flavor: A white hole. Note that it is white.

upgrades.name: Wormhole
upgrades.flavor: Like a black and white hole, combined into one.

upgrades.name: Big Hole
upgrades.flavor: Bigger than all other holes combined.

upgrades.name: Magic Hole
upgrades.flavor: Go though it, and PRESTO! You're in another universe!

upgrades.name: Square Hole
upgrades.flavor: A physical impossibility, before your very eyes!

upgrades.name: Flux Capacitor
upgrades.flavor: What is flux? This helpful piece of machinery will get it out of your life.

upgrades.name: Lambert Particle
upgrades.flavor: Humphry Lambert discovered this while studing sedimentary rocks. LOOK AT THE LAYERS.

upgrades.name: Schnauzer's Unindustrialized Diffusion
upgrades.flavor: Rumored to be something about chipmunks.

upgrades.name: Cohen's Quark
upgrades.flavor: No one notices this because it is so small and carries virtually zero energy.

upgrades.name: Endymion Matter
upgrades.flavor: Named for Edward Endymion, of foosball fame.

upgrades.name: Schlutz's Universe
upgrades.flavor: A theorietical universe, made of donuts.

upgrades.name: Mass Condenser
upgrades.flavor: Condenses mass on to your donut.

upgrades.name: Spin
upgrades.flavor: Now avaliable in two flavors!

upgrades.name: Recursive Metajoke
upgrades.flavor: Now you may laugh at this description about laughing about this description outside the game.

upgrades.name: Antimatter
upgrades.flavor: Now you can explode at home too!

upgrades.name: Alternate Universes
upgrades.flavor: It was bound to happen somewhere.

upgrades.name: Meta Donut
upgrades.flavor: Out of this world.

upgrades.name: Upgrade -1
upgrades.flavor: Definitely not a glitch.

upgrades.name: Upgrade MissingNo
upgrades.flavor: Use HiddenPower!

upgrades.name: Upgrade Wall Through
upgrades.flavor: Doors are so 5 minutes ago.

upgrades.name: Upgrade of Enchanting
upgrades.flavor: A basic potionsmithy ought to take this up.

upgrades.name: Upgrade UUDDLRLRAB
upgrades.flavor: Definitly no cheating going on here.

upgrades.name: Upgrade Finale
upgrades.flavor: Goodbye! (There's definitly not a 200 building upgrade for this one...)

upgrades.name: Upgrade %REt5$GfWtfdfR
upgrades.flavor: %$tF4TGsdUY4$FDg%
